code: import axios from"axios";const apiURL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;export const getAllOrder=async()=>{try{let res=await axios.get(`${apiURL}/api/order/get-all-orders`);return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const editCategory=async(oId,status)=>{let data={oId:oId,status:status};console.log(data);try{let res=await axios.post(`${apiURL}/api/order/update-order`,data);return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const deleteOrder=async oId=>{let data={oId:oId};try{let res=await axios.post(`${apiURL}/api/order/delete-order`,data);return res.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};
